original_text: But the king's command had seemed disgusting to Joab. So he did not count the men from the tribes of Levi and Benjamin.
korean_text: 요압이 왕의 명령을 마땅치 않게 여겨 레위와 베냐민 사람은 계수하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the king's command had seemed disgusting to Joab
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 왕의 명령은 요압에게 역겹게 보였다

sentences.original_text: So he did not count the men
from the tribes of Levi and Benjamin
